channel.title: Some really quick questions
channel.description:
Q1-How do I make it that you need to be 5 or lower runecrafting to enter a portal. Can anyone please give me a code?
[s]Q2-How do I make items spawn on the ground?[/s] (Answered, Thanks WalrusFear)
Q3-How do I make it so when you use a key on a door you tele inside? Can anyone please give me a code?

item.title: Some really quick questions
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

oh sorry i got used to putting that today =] thank you for clearing that up

Read full topic

item.title: Some really quick questions
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

Actually I Metal I, it would be:

if(playerLevel[20] <= 5) { //Portal Teleporting code here or something }

Putting the semi-colon would come up with a weird error.

Also, you mean Q3, not Q2. Heh, sorry. Thought I’d clear that up.

Read full topic

item.title: Some really quick questions
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Rich Dude99, post:1, topic:112614”]Q1-How do I make it that you need to be 5 or lower runecrafting to enter a portal. Can anyone please give me a code?

Q2-How do I make items spawn on the ground? (Answered, Thanks WalrusFear)

Q3-How do I make it so when you use a key on a door you tele inside? Can anyone please give me a code?[/quote]

like this

Q1 if(playerLevel[20] <= 5); (i think)

and

Q2 if (useItemID == KEYID && atObjectID == DOORID)

hope these helps

Read full topic
